website_summaries.verdict: With 61 keys, this is a good mid-size model for casual pianists with limited space.
pros: A sleek, no-frills keyboard with 61 keys
Its lightweight and slim design make it easy to tuck away when not in use
cons: Unweighted keys feel a bit too springy

customer_reviews.title: 5 star Yamaha!
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to say about this really besides an amazing setup for my six year old girl who wants to start learning the keyboard/piano. I purchased this electronic piano with a stand and seat at a brilliant price. It also comes with a book stand and a connection for headphones. The sound is spot on and the whole family love having a play with this. Overall I am really please with this purchase and would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Wilsc

customer_reviews.title: I love my new piano
customer_reviews.text: I love my new piano. It's great for someone like me who is just learning to play. Sleek design and no unnecessary add-ons. Just the basic functions and a few alternative sounds such as harpsichord , organ etc. I liked the fact that Yamaha provided me with three months online tuition as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Keyboard for both beginner or experienced user.
customer_reviews.text: The Yamaha Piaggero NP12 keyboard seemed to tick all the boxes for me. I wanted to re-kindle my love for piano playing without spending a fortune .I was looking for a keyboard that features piano style keys,and has a good piano sound and feel. The Yamaha provides this. It is not without its small annoyances ,like no digital display of metronome tempo and transpose key for instance,but I can live with that. All in,very pleased with my purchase and would recommend the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: I really like this, a very sturdy instrument
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, a very sturdy instrument, Definitely a best buy. I like the fact that there are no "tons of unnecessary sound effects etc" sounds absolutely incredible using a high quality pair of headphones. and of course the three months free use of Flowkey, which is also great. overall great valve for money. definitely five stars...
customer_reviews.author: bill reddy

customer_reviews.title: Well it's okay, not brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Well it's okay. Not as brilliant as others reviewers have raved about it, on Amazon and other places. My main criticism is the volume. It is way too low, even with the volume turned up. I am considering returning it, and swapping it for a Casio keyboard. I do own a Casio keyboard, and although basic, at least the sound volume, is more than acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike.

customer_reviews.title: You have to pay to send faulty goods back
customer_reviews.text: Piano is faulty but I'm being made to pay to send it back. Appalling, it's heavy and will cost a fortune. This is the last time I ever order anything on Amazon that's large. Too much of a hassle
customer_reviews.author: ShellyAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good keyboard. The sound is awesome, it has semi-weighted keys and I think it's a great choice for people starting out because it doesn't take up as much space as a full scale one. I did have to remove a star because the volume knob fell off somehow. Not sure how that happened but I can still control the volume setting, it just looks a little less in quality. Overall, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: no unless you want just an hobby
customer_reviews.text: not for professionals. Once discovered the not weighted keys I returned the item and the Seller charged me the postage even after I contacted them and explain the reason evidencing the lack of description once the keyboard was bought. No good unless you want to play with a nice sounding toy, not a thing for sure to have on stage. Especially starting to learn with those keys is not suggestible.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Waters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this keyboard for my children who are learning to play the piano. Wanted to get something simple (without too many buttons to distract them) and portable so we can pack away when needed. Fits the bill perfectly and they seem to enjoy playing on it. I’m not sure how long it will last before having to upgrade but is definitely perfect for now to see if they enjoy learning to play.
customer_reviews.author: FranP

customer_reviews.title: It’s a 61 key keyboard and it’s very nicely laid out. This keyboard is like a real piano.
customer_reviews.text: This Yamaha keyboard gives me exactly what I need as I am a beginner. My previous Yamaha keyboard was okay, but to complicated for me to learn basics.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Davies

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic start for newbies
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to learn piano. This is perfect size for beginners. No silly gimmicks, just some simple tones and full size keys. The sound through the speakers is not great, but through headphones it is amazing, highly recommended. For those worried apart the number keys available, everything I have learnt so far is within the range of the keys, and I am completely new to keyboard. I am following an online course on Udemy, and also trying a few videos from YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good price.
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this purchase. It is not a keyboard but an electric piano with different piano sounds. It is exactly what I wanted to improve and brush up my piano skills as I no longer have the room for an upright. It sounds good. Some reviewers say it is too quiet, but this suits me perfectly. My only moan, and a very slight one, is that the sheet music holder could do with an arm or peg to keep the music at the desired page. Inexpensive and great piano sound.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Been using this piano for a few months now and I am more than pleased with it. It's not full of buttons and functions that you will never use, it only has what you need. It looks nice and sleek, great colours. Giving 4 stars instead of 5 because it sometimes sounds out of tune for some reason, and the keys are a little plasticy when compared with proper weighted keys, but otherwise great keyboard, would highly recommend as a gift or for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Szucs

customer_reviews.title: So much fun...
customer_reviews.text: I`m a complete beginner on keyboards, bought this because of the virus isolation and for study reasons (a Ph.D research thing)... It sounds good and is fun to play. The touch sensitivity is useful (even though I read some reviews that say it is too much) as it really highlights the relative strengths of the fingers and raises awareness of the need to attend to the balance between them. It`s also fun, in a not too distracting way: playing exercises as a harpsichord or organ sometimes still sounds nice and makes you think about musicality... So far I love it, and feel, for the price, it's a serious instrument, a bargain, and I look forward to playing it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: mandelstam

customer_reviews.title: Not really weighted
customer_reviews.text: The keys are all springy and the touch sensitivity is also poor. It ticks a lot of boxes in the description but you will be left wanting. It caused me to go off of learning piano for a little while. Buy a better one for another £100 if you can afford it. This isn't a bad choice for beginners, but like I say, it was enough to put me off learning.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: They don't last forever.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this model (NP12) which is a replacement for the NP11 we had had for over 5 years. The NP11 just stopped working. We tried to get it repaired but were told the repair cost would be greater than buying a new one. The NP11 has been replaced by the NP12 which has an additional, useful feature of being able to play back what you have just played.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: everything works
customer_reviews.text: (After 1 month). The sound is good, the keys feel good, the controls are clear and easy to use, the unit is very lightweight but stays in position without retaining straps. Not tried so far: connecting a sustaining pedal, connecting to a computer, running on batteries. Possible limitations (which do not matter to me): no complex facilities for creating multi-instrument recordings, only 8 "voices", can store only one recording at a time. (It's more an electric piano than a mulit-purpose keyboard.)
customer_reviews.author: GDR

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes definitely a good buy. Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Just unwrapped this as it is a Christmas present for my grandson so I thought I'd better check all was ok. What a great little keyboard tried it myself and can only describe as really great
customer_reviews.author: john harper

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Sounds is clear, if you want to hook-up your 3.5mm earphones then you can do directly, no need for any adaptors. Nice key press. Got a few different tones which is nice but I personally don't use them. The power lead is a bit small in length.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rowatt

customer_reviews.title: A friend of me recommended this because it has many sounds effect including pianos
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolute beginner to keyboards/piano. A friend of me recommended this because it has many sounds effect including pianos. Some basic keyboards don't give piano sound. I really like it and would recommend if you're a beginner like me. I ordered in the color, white. I'm happy about it too.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product - it won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: Received this today - plugged it in and played it for a few minutes to test it then turned it off again. The next time I tried to turn it on it wouldn't. It's completed dead. Have tested the plug socket - which is fine. Either the keyboard or the plug that was provided with it is faulty and having waited a month for this to arrive I now cannot play it. Very disappointing. Do not bother buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: TBTwick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Sounds beautiful, feels beautiful, LOOKS beautiful. I’m so in love with this digital piano.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Black

customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband as a present. He is a beginner and LOVES it. Easy to use, easy to assemble and very straight forward. Great sound quality. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my seven year old son who is learning piano. We didn't want a keyboard with lots of distractions like drum beats and a million different sound effects. This is perfect, it sounds beautiful, it looks beautiful and we're really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emperor Nero

customer_reviews.title: Good buy , very quiet
customer_reviews.text: The piano sound was not quiet as good as the Hype. But a good all round first touch sensitive piano for learning on. Was brought for Grandson whom has been playing on a non sensitive keyboard. Have not yet brought pedal so cannot say what that is like. The adjustment settings did seem to increase the volume but I would have expected it to be louder
customer_reviews.author: grandadb

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and lightweight keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good keyboard for my daughter to take ti Uni as she cant take her piano. It is touch sensitive and has 61 keys. The volume doesn't go very high, I guess this will require extra speakers. Overall very happy with this and delivery considering the chaos was very prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Datta

customer_reviews.title: Superb keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Superb keyboard. Neither paying too much for things you don't need, nor cheapo with lots of buttons and effects for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: Good Piano
customer_reviews.text: Great instrument, the only problem I have with this piano is the middle C note is not actually in the middle, which kinda throws me off a lot. Other than that, a great choice of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son as a first intro to playing the piano. It is much better quality and sound than I expected. A friend bought one after trying this. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good quality starter electronic piano
customer_reviews.text: Good quality starter electronic piano. The sound is good quality but it is not very loud so we have to turn the volume up quite high.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha NP-12 keyboard piano
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality much better than i expected, im just getting to grips with learning my for song. Very good value for the price, awesome piece of kit just wish it was a little louder.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought to try and learn the piano so didn’t want to spend too much and impressed with the quality for the price. Has a nice sound to it.
customer_reviews.author: disrep

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tool does every thing you would expect of Yamaha
customer_reviews.author: Mr A F Williams

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS FOR 19 YEAR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER'S XMAS PRESENT. DID A SH*TLOAD OF RESEARCH AND THIS ONE CAME OUT TOPS. NOT DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a present for my partner who plays very well...grate 7 ...she was very happy arrived on time very well packed excellent quality very good sound..very happy
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Great piano for people starting to learn how to play
customer_reviews.text: I have just started to learn how to play the piano and this is great! I love the minimalist look it has and it isn't covered with hundreds of different sounds which make no sense. It has a decent sound quality and the touch-sensitive keys are very responsive and make playing the piano have a nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: Sachin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this purchase strongly. I am just a beginner at piano and decided to invest in this one. Playing with this piano is great, you just want to keep playing it because it sounds so great
customer_reviews.author: Tom Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound and perfect weight of keys
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner I was looking for a keyboard with a brand name I could trust. I spent many hours looking at reviews and I was not dissaponted. Great sound, keys are really nice to press and feels and looks top quality. I play for an hour each day and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Taking up the piano, and this is just simple and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin H

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 13 year olds Christmas. Its brilliant, sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old uses this to practice at home and its been exactly what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: MacConvert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We all love this keyboard. It’s slick looking with amazing sound.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: First keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and been wanting to learn how to play. Really happy with this
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Typical non weighted keyboard keys
customer_reviews.text: Returned. It has beautiful looks. Even touch sensitive keys feel horrible. Go for semi weighted at the least. But that costs so much more. :(
customer_reviews.author: leegolding

customer_reviews.title: good one
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for my son Christmas time and so far no issues
customer_reviews.author: Harald huber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sond! Amazing kyeboard!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur pianist that loves the great sounds of a Grand piano. It's not the same, true, but its sound is pretty similar as one. A really nice one to start with and to spend lots of hours playing it :) Totally recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Patric

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time playing a digital piano and NP-12 is great (previously played Upright piano). Quality is very good compared to the price. White colour is so nice as well. Delivery is before the expected date so I can enjoy the piano earlier :)
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: The best for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this piano as a beginner, and so far am enjoying it. Very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: value for money
customer_reviews.text: For its value, it does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Fidias Ieridis

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard for a beginner that wants something that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Best keyboard for a beginner that wants something that is as close to a real piano as possible. Heavy keys, with a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple & Beautiful design. As a beginner, I am loving it!
customer_reviews.author: London

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha piano
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this.tone much better than expected.prompt delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Marje

customer_reviews.title: We loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 7 yr old daughter. We loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Good for beginners and advanced players, would have preferred heavier keys though.
customer_reviews.author: Camelia Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners piano
customer_reviews.text: Great beginners piano, easy to set up and use. Sound quality is good
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: A gret keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Lovely Keyboard for my daughter to start off with, perfect....
customer_reviews.author: Ian Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good keyboard just wish the speakers were a little louder.
customer_reviews.author: Iron man

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great! Works well with the pedal I bought and will be amazing for performing!
customer_reviews.author: CJamison

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to focus!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome instrument for its cost range. It has a simple design that allows me to focus on what is important for learning. As a beginner, I find it most helpful
customer_reviews.author: EDWAR LEMA CHILIGUANO

customer_reviews.title: Excellant my teenage daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant , great sound and great value. It's perfect for those that only want the piano and not all the mixers etc.
customer_reviews.author: Clare N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard. Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice keyboard. Good sound. Good value for beginner but would upgrade at later stage if child is interested in progressing through grades
customer_reviews.author: Irene Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for beginners - great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Volume could be a bit louder bit overall v happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R.

customer_reviews.title: Just great does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard to learn on. Simple controls and great sound. Highly recommend this well done Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Birch

customer_reviews.title: Best Keyboard for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard ! I did a review view on the web before buying to get an idea of the quality and everything is as I had expected ! 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Matthewt

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners! But use with earphones
customer_reviews.text: 1 star taken off because sound quality from speakers isn't great, although it sounds good when wearing ear/headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Emma.A

customer_reviews.title: Great budget keyboard
customer_reviews.text: A great keyboard for the price. Good keys for the money less emphasis on features so the product is a great practice instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Crockpot01

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piano
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my son and he loves it. Sound quality is great and it was certainly great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Cooksley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, great for beginners or more experienced players. Sounds like a real piano, great tone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: All good accept the tones in the middle of the keyboard not balanced
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cucu

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I had this year!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I had this year, hassle-free delivery and high quality product! Excited to enhance my piano skills.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard just learning how to play and l am so pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: She says the sound is great and the build quality of a very high finish ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my wife and she is over the moon with it. She says the sound is great and the build quality of a very high finish which is what you would expect of Yamaha, even though it is not up at the top of their range of digital pianos. The keys, she says have just the right 'feel' for her and will now wants me to purchase a sustain pedal to go with it. I would recommend this for a starter or someone just going back to the piano because of the very reasonable price and good brand name.
customer_reviews.author: 123boltonboy

customer_reviews.title: A Well Received and Appreciated Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for my partner who wanted a larger keyboard for music production and composition. He originally wanted only a midi controller, but after discussion, we decided upon this model as it can be used as a standalone electric piano too without having to be hooked up to his laptop and Fruity Loops. As a bonus, he's finding it to be a great distraction method to help his anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: TheCatsDad

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for a good 'keyboard' for my young teen daughter
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good 'keyboard' for my young teen daughter, and nearly got caught out by cheaper synths that don't offer touch-sensitive and near-full-size keys. This one does - it feels very much like a 'real' piano. My daughter wasn't worried about the fact that it has only 10 sounds compared to the hundreds of sounds offered by other keyboards, whether cheaper or more expensive. One of the reasons for this is the sound quality - the piano sounds from the onboard speakers are just terrific. It sounds great, it plays brilliantly - thoroughly happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mat P

customer_reviews.title: Love it and it looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Ideal for my return venture into playing music again. Looks good, but be aware it is sleek and narrow, most stands are too wide.
customer_reviews.author: veronica walker

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with the sound compared to her old mid range ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my mother who was looking for something without the usual keyboard bells and whistles. She is very happy with the sound compared to her old mid range keyboard with all the effects. The quality/price ratio is positive!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard. Really does sound like a good piano
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard. Really does sound like a good piano. I am absolutely delighted also with it's recording facility as it acts as a great teaching aid.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: I didnt want a keyboard with all those awful noises ...
customer_reviews.text: I didnt want a keyboard with all those awful noises it could be capable of and to be honest, are a distraction. Turn it on, look at it, admire its clear lines and start playing. And, boy, does it sound gooooood.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: White look very nice, bit bigger that I’m expected
customer_reviews.text: White look very nice ,bit bigger that I’m expected ,good sound ,perfect for 13 years old daughter ,she was so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: SPATAR NARCISA

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday he is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: suds

customer_reviews.title: Simple lightweight and fun
customer_reviews.text: I brought this digital piano as a complete beginner, mainly due to the good reviews. I did not want to invest too much money into something i may not use. Well i can say it does its job fantastically, its simple non fussy design is great. Theres very little to distract you here. Of course the keys are not weighted which does not futureproof it very well. But this will see you through your early days, that is until you decide on treating yourself on something a bit more grand. If like me you wanted to kick-start a hobby in piano without the fear of wasting money then this is a solid option for sure
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great piano,I love it. Sounds just like a real piano and great value for money. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sez2

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound dial doesn't seem to work so it's not very loud
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value intermediate keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound. Reasonably light. Piano keys feel slightly smaller and not weighted c/w traditional piano. It is a good intermediate for lower-grade practicing or general home entertainment. If taking seriously/more money to burn, you will want something with a more realistic piano-key-action. It's good value for money for what it offers.
customer_reviews.author: P0ndering

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Looking And Sounding Digital Piano
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Digital Piano, sounds are great, its a lovely colour and looks professional, the keys feel nice and USB compatibility makes it great to learn with Skoove interactive lessons and tutorials (which came with a FREE 3 month subscription... which I bought in full afterwords)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Light keys, feels plastic! Poor sound quality. It is an ok piano.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R.

customer_reviews.title: Could be a good one, for sure
customer_reviews.text: I changed my mind while it was out for delivery and had swapped it to a P-45 before this NP12 got to me so I do not have any impressions on the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Zarani

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: A good keyboard but nothing special, you can get one as good for a lot cheaper, your paying more for the name
customer_reviews.author: Maxx McCormack

customer_reviews.title: The right keyboard for us
customer_reviews.text: After a lapse of some 60 years, my wife yearned to have a piano. In our small bungalow we had no room so I decide to buy her a keyboard for Christmas. After research on line and Utube, we bought the Alesis Recital Pro. This was the perfect instrument but too heavy and large and I had difficulty in just lifting it. So had to return and this is main reason I am glad to have purchased from Amazon. Returns are pain free. Next we looked for a smaller keyboard and settled for the Piagero from Yamaha.. This has proved a very good smaller alternative and easily handled by us both.
customer_reviews.author: Johnep

customer_reviews.title: Realistic piano and sampled sounds
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic budget keyboard with good action for non weighted keys. My children use this at their school, so ideal insofar as not sacrificing touch and feel against a real piano at an early stage.
customer_reviews.author: Velon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and best
customer_reviews.text: My Kids piano teacher gave this model for her classes. The product arrived on time.The adapter to use on to the wall socket helped me in buying frequent batteries.My kid absolutely loves this piano. My next product P45 and as it was little expensive for my budget and I went for this model.Best piano to start with for the kids andfor beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome V.

customer_reviews.title: Wow wonderful exquisite item
customer_reviews.text: Wow what can I say except this is such great value for money the exquisite sound of a grand, but light weight and portable. Bought for my 9yr old son who's working towards his grading. Excellent quality , sleek and looks really really expensive but for the sound and quality it is inexpensive. Grab yourself a bargain now !
customer_reviews.author: Mrs m

product_meta.title: Yamaha NP-12 Piaggero Slimline Home Keyboard
feature_bullets: Can be used with digital piano controller app
